verses:
Saviour, breathe forgiveness o'er us All our weakness thou dost
know: Thou didst tread this earth before us, Thou didst feel its 
keenest woe; hone and dreary, faint and 
weary, 
Through1the desert, Thou didst go.

spirit of our God, decending, fill our hearts with heavely joy, love with every
passion blending, pleasure that can never clog Thou provided, pardoned, 
Guided, nothing can our peace 
destroy.
